entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 28. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 08 February 2023
